level.heading: VEHICLE LABELING AND IDENTIFICATION REQUIREMENTS (ยง 20-909)

level.text: The Mayor shall issue a clean-fuel identification sticker to any vehicle that meets the clean-fuel vehicle emission standards contained in ยง 906.3 of this chapter that has passed inspection in the District.
The clean-fuel vehicle identification sticker is void if removed.
The Mayor shall issue an alternative fuel identification sticker to any clean-fuel vehicle that is powered by an alternative fuel and has passed inspection in the District.
The alternative fuel identification sticker is void if removed.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Section 3(a) of the Clean Fuel Fleet Vehicle Program and Alternative Fuels Incentives Amendment Act of 1994, D.C. Law 10-201, 41 DCR 7178, 7190 (November 4, 1994).
